channel.title: Help? lol.........points..?
channel.description:
ok, so when ppl pk..they kill ppl. it tells them theyre pk points.
like...
[code] sendMessage("You killed someone"+otherkillc+"those are your points now"); [/code]
but when i go to where it says combat lvl and total lvl and where it usually says qp if i put..
[code] sendQuest("@whi@Pkp:"+otherkillc+"", 3985); } [/code]
it always says 0!!!!
ANY HELP??
PLEASE DONT SPAM/FLAME!
